snippet: Ron the Greek will not run in the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic on Saturday because he has a hoof injury.
abstract: Ron the Greek will not run in the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic due to a hoof injury.
lead_paragraph: Ron the Greek will not run in the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic on Saturday because he has a hoof injury.

headline.main: Ron the Greek Is Out of Classic
headline.print_headline: Ron the Greek Is Out of Classic
